requirements.name: API Response Time
requirements.description: 95th percentile API response time shall be under 500ms
requirements.measurement: Server-side response time excluding network latency

requirements.name: Page Load Time
requirements.description: Initial page load time shall be under 3 seconds

requirements.name: Concurrent Users
requirements.description: System shall support 10-20 concurrent users

requirements.name: Database Query Time
requirements.description: Database queries shall complete within 100ms
requirements.measurement: Query execution time at database level

requirements.name: Report Generation
requirements.description: Standard reports shall generate within 10 seconds
requirements.measurement: Time from request to PDF/Excel file ready

requirements.name: File Upload
requirements.description: File uploads up to 10MB shall complete within 30 seconds
requirements.measurement: Time from upload start to confirmation

requirements.name: Payroll Processing
requirements.description: Monthly payroll for 50 employees shall complete within 5 minutes
requirements.measurement: Time from payroll run initiation to completion

requirements.name: HTTPS Encryption
requirements.description: All communications shall use HTTPS with TLS 1.2+

requirements.name: Password Hashing
requirements.description: Passwords shall be hashed using bcrypt with cost factor 12

requirements.name: JWT Token Security
requirements.description: JWT tokens shall expire after 24 hours and use HS256 signing

requirements.name: Role-Based Access Control
requirements.description: All API endpoints shall enforce RBAC based on user role
requirements.measurement: Unauthorized access attempts blocked and logged

requirements.name: SQL Injection Prevention
requirements.description: All database queries shall use parameterized queries

requirements.name: XSS Prevention
requirements.description: All user input shall be sanitized to prevent XSS attacks

requirements.name: Audit Logging
requirements.description: All sensitive operations shall be logged with user, timestamp, and action

requirements.name: Account Lockout
requirements.description: Accounts shall be locked after 5 consecutive failed login attempts

requirements.name: Data Encryption at Rest
requirements.description: Sensitive data (PAN, bank details) shall be encrypted at rest

requirements.name: API Rate Limiting
requirements.description: API shall enforce rate limiting to prevent abuse

requirements.name: System Uptime
requirements.description: System shall maintain 99.5% uptime (excluding planned maintenance)

requirements.name: Planned Maintenance Window
requirements.description: Planned maintenance shall be limited to 4 hours per month
requirements.measurement: Maintenance scheduled during off-hours (IST 2 AM - 6 AM)

requirements.name: Recovery Time Objective
requirements.description: System shall recover from failure within 4 hours
requirements.measurement: Time from failure detection to service restoration

requirements.name: Recovery Point Objective
requirements.description: Data loss in case of failure shall be limited to 24 hours

requirements.name: Backup Frequency
requirements.description: Database shall be backed up daily with 30-day retention

requirements.name: Health Monitoring
requirements.description: System shall expose health check endpoints for monitoring

requirements.name: User Capacity
requirements.description: System shall support growth from 5 to 50 employees

requirements.name: Data Growth
requirements.description: System shall handle 5 years of transaction data
requirements.target: 5 years data retention with acceptable performance

requirements.name: Vertical Scaling
requirements.description: System shall support vertical scaling of VPS resources
requirements.measurement: No architectural changes needed for VPS upgrade

requirements.name: Database Size
requirements.description: System shall perform well with database up to 10GB

requirements.name: Transaction Integrity
requirements.description: All financial transactions shall be atomic and consistent

requirements.name: Error Handling
requirements.description: System shall handle errors gracefully without data loss
requirements.measurement: Error logs with stack traces, user-friendly messages

requirements.name: Data Validation
requirements.description: All input data shall be validated before processing

requirements.name: Calculation Accuracy
requirements.description: Financial calculations shall be accurate to 2 decimal places
requirements.measurement: Unit tests for all financial calculations

requirements.name: Code Coverage - Backend
requirements.description: Backend code shall have minimum 80% test coverage

requirements.name: Code Coverage - Frontend
requirements.description: Frontend code shall have minimum 60% test coverage

requirements.name: Code Documentation
requirements.description: All public APIs shall have docstrings/JSDoc comments

requirements.name: Type Safety
requirements.description: Full TypeScript and Python type hints coverage

requirements.name: Database Migrations
requirements.description: All schema changes shall be tracked via migrations

requirements.name: Logging
requirements.description: System shall implement structured logging for debugging

requirements.name: Responsive Design
requirements.description: UI shall be responsive and work on desktop and tablet
requirements.measurement: UI tested on common screen sizes

requirements.name: Browser Support
requirements.description: System shall support Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge (latest 2 versions)

requirements.name: Accessibility
requirements.description: UI shall follow basic WCAG 2.1 Level A guidelines

requirements.name: Form Validation
requirements.description: Forms shall provide real-time validation feedback

requirements.name: Loading States
requirements.description: UI shall show loading indicators for async operations
requirements.target: Loading state for all async operations

requirements.name: Data Privacy
requirements.description: System shall comply with IT Act 2000 data protection requirements

requirements.name: Financial Record Retention
requirements.description: Financial records shall be retained for 8 years per Companies Act

requirements.name: Statutory Compliance
requirements.description: System shall support current India PF, ESI, PT, TDS, GST rules

requirements.name: Audit Trail
requirements.description: System shall maintain immutable audit trail for 2 years
requirements.measurement: Audit logs cannot be modified or deleted
